pr_title: Android - Hiding trends button if there's no charts enabled for the study

timeline.message: Hiding trends button for charts, if there's no charts enabled for the study.

timeline.author: nikklassen

replies.bodyText: This should've been caught by an automated tool. Can you explain why this was not the case?
replies.author: nikklassen

replies.bodyText: Thanks, Updated in the latest commit.

replies.bodyText:
This should've been caught by an automated tool. Can you explain why this was not the case?

Sorry, it had slipped.
